tgt_original: adhyātmamayoniśaḥ kathaṃkathībhavataḥ ke santaḥ ke bhaviṣyāmaḥ |  ayaṃ sattvaḥ kuta āgataḥ |
pārasāntānikānsaṃskārānmitrāmitrodāsīnato'  yoniśaḥ kalpayato yadajñānaṃ |  karmaṇyajñānaṃ katamat |  karmakartāramayoniśaḥ kalpayato yadajñānaṃ |
vipākaphalasaṃgṛhītānsaṃskārānvedakato'  yoniśaḥ kalpayato yadajñānaṃ |  karmavipāke'  jñānaṃ katamat |  vitathaṃ karma tatphalaṃ cāyoniśaḥ kalpayato yadajñānaṃ |
buddhānāṃ bodhimamanasi kurvato vā mithyā vā manasi kurvataḥ pramādyato vā kāṅkṣato vāpavadato vā yadajñānaṃ |
